revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Essays on physiognomy : designed to promote the knowledge and the love of mankind / By John Caspar Lavater ... Illustrated by more than eight hundred engravings ac..."
revision.text: Possibly: Essays on physiognomy : designed to promote the knowledge and the love of mankind / By John Caspar Lavater ... Illustrated by more than eight hundred engravings accurately copied; and some duplicates added from originals. Executed by, or under the inspection of, Thomas Holloway. Translated from the French by Henry Hunter. Issued in 41 parts, 1788-1799. 3v. in 5. (London : John Murray, H. Hunter, and T. Holloway, 1789-98 [i. e. 1788-99]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1437648~S1
